website_summaries.verdict: Ankle-high shoe constructed of all man-made materials, including upper nylon mesh. Available in 6 colors, including hot pink.
pros: Most customers love these shoes, raving about their comfort, grip, and fit
Sizes are true for almost all who purchased them
Ankle height allows more freedom of movement, and rubber sole is designed not to slip
cons: Some people claimed the shoes didn't hold up
Others mentioned they wanted more ankle support, or didn't like the shiny, vinyl "patent-leather-look" upper sole

customer_reviews.title: Fit like gloves on my feet 👍🏾👍🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are amazing for the price. Got them on sale for half of the price currently listed. I got mine a size bigger so I'd have room to put some shoe inserts, since they were quite thin with no support like the other reviewer said. And I have a foot injury and did not think I could wear them and they'd be comfortable but they are. They truly feel light weight and would highly recommend cause you will feel a difference as opposed to wearing regular shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad not bad at all. 👌
customer_reviews.text: I bought these without reading the reviews thinking they're going to be crap. Once I read the reviews people said they had no ankle support. But to my surprise in the shoes have been great you need to tie them really tight to have a good ankle support the really lightweight and they have made me quicker! It's all about how you time and it's not uncomfortable either! So far they've been great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend more for better quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these boots. I've been looking for something just like these to wear in pro wrestling training as an alternative to $100+ wrestling boots but you get what you paid for. Within moments of trying to put this shoe on and adjusting the laces on one of them, the bridge over the middle laces snapped in two. The plastic material isn't strong enough to handle that, so it would definitely not hold up in a wrestling class. Time to return these and look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schweizer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I only tried on the left shoe and didn’t inspect the right one. So maybe partially my fault for not noticing until now. Apparently the R on the right foot wasn’t printed properly so someone took some white paint and poorly painted on the R. Now I’m kinda questioning if these are even authentic Ringside shoes. I hadn’t had time to wear these since I bought them so I’m sure it’s past the return date. Won’t be buying from this seller again or Ringside shoes unless purchasing in person.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After a few months of using these for mainly heavy bag work, they have held up well. They still look and feel brand new. Mind you, I'm not using these for sparring, just for heavy bag work. I'll use these at the minimum three days a week so I can't vouch for how they would do if I sparred in them. Nevertheless the quality is good and they look good. They are functional and I'm fully happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ray

customer_reviews.title: Get value
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for I give them 5 stars because they where affordable they look good and there name brand.They did have some fingerprints on the black shiny part but I wiped those right off probably came from shipping.Just a great boxing or wrestling shoe for 60 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever pair of boxing shoes. I only used them for a few weeks, to hit the heavy bag about 10-15 times or maybe 50 rounds. The laces started to fray which makes them a pain to lace up. The Ringside tag on the back of the shoe is coming off. The paint is rubbing off. They offer some support but they are still pretty soft and I would like a harder pair for my next boxing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Squidman

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the hot pink shoes, which come in womens sizes. I love them! I just got them today and I'm already thinking about getting all the other colors and the extra high top ones in black. It feels like my feet are being hugged. I thought the patent was going to be stiff, but it was so soft, the shoes move with you so well! Almost like a sock! Lots of ankle support and I can't wait to get the extra High top ones for even more support!
customer_reviews.author: Mjsingh

customer_reviews.title: Can't rate yet  but will If I don't deside to cancel order/ UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on 12-1-2019, had to return due to size, Now I am waiting until 1-5-2020 for my replacements ....... Don't seem correct! I could go buy a second pair and be shipped on 12-19-19 ..... Hummmmm...../ shipping was moved up thank you..... size 9 fits my size 10 foot, Been using them for several weeks now light training Boxing no issues nice shoes good buy!!..........
customer_reviews.author: Russell Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had to revise my review, heel started peeling back after two weeks of training on boxing mats, and nowhere else. Don't waste your money, buy a nicer shoe that will last longer. Maybe these are ok for some things, but if you are actually training boxing (and I assume it'd be even more wear and tear for wrestling), they will not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Won't last the season
customer_reviews.text: Do not seem well made. Padding cut short at eyelets, making top 2 unusable without causing discomfort to ankle front. Soles are glued with no stitching reinforcement. Narrow at ball of foot. Thick soled. Shiny easy to clean material. Vivid cooler. No arch support and not flexible as should be for "wrestling" shoes, per advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great so far. Fit as expected, good quality for the price, and as light as you could want. If I had realized how much of the shoe is glossy black, I might have picked a different style... but that's just my preference.... it's a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes under the "used" section and the seller said they were in "mint condition" that could be furthest from the truth, these shoes are great and i train in them! The only down side for flatter, narrow feet like mine is that this shoe will need an insole! It is very flat and my right toe gives me problems! Cotton socks and insoles will do the trick! Great shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Scottesha Nickelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizing - went 2 sizes down as recommended, and super cute! They are screaming neon and shiny and sure to be the talk of the gym! (No arch support, might need a size up if you use arches)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: very orange
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 Nike and 10 Aldo dress shoe and the 10 fit me perfectly with my orthodic. I do have pretty wide/ flat feet and When I tie them the two sides almost touch. The picture dosnt show how orange these shoes are. They border line glow in the dark. Seem to be a hit with the ladies
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have made ALL the difference! I decided to buy them after dealing with a lot of foot and ankle pain from working out with regular sneakers. And honestly, it was the best decision I could have made! I no longer feel any pain and my turns are swift and solid. If you're serious about boxing, I would invest in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Comfort. And style
customer_reviews.text: The patent leather look...looks...great although it is easy to scuff.. The shoe is comfortable... it ties well and takes little time to break in. I am training to be a pro wrestler and these boots allow me the support and grip I need to work a ring. Great product
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Solid value, work great as a water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear these on a Jetski for support and traction on a standup Jetski, used with a water sock and there holding up to racing conditions and abuse well even being wet all day.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I got them for a ridiculous price (under 20) and they're light and comfortable. I'm a female, and typically wear a size 8, so honestly, these were slightly large. In the future, I might purchase a 6 or 06 (which I assume is 6.5). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luchadora

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow, need to order two sizes up if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, you need to order a size up, unfortunately these shoes stare so narrow I would need to order two sizes up. I’m a bit disappointed, hopefully the return goes ok.
customer_reviews.author: AlainRaitt

customer_reviews.title: Mens sizing. Run big for women.
customer_reviews.text: If they would have fit I would have kept. Found out they are men's sizes. Not sure what man will wear the hot pink. Don't have the color in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Green

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the most part
customer_reviews.text: i need good support on the right ankle, but not on the left. Actually, when I lace all the way up on the left, the top of the shoe was hurting the back of my leg. So I lowered the lace on the left shoe and it works now. Very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: h a

customer_reviews.title: A little tight, 0.5 size up would be great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are good AF! But! I wear women size 9 and it came up truly to limits my size like no space for extra moves (I used to have a bit looser shoes), but it seems fine, so I keep them and enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: annabolizm

customer_reviews.title: Fit right
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 and they fit to size perfectly.i use them for my martial arts studies.i did put better insoles in for greater comfort.great work out shoes will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: PINK SIZING
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these shoes! BUT beware of the sizing of the hot pink!!! I normally wear an 8 in women’s and a 6 in men’s, and since the caption said the hot pink runs in women sizes I ordered the 8. AFTER THE THIRD SIZE DOWN I NEEDED THE 6!!!! Just order the men’s size in the pink and save yourself some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Flashy Footwear for the ring!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boxing shoes! I have them in many colors, they're comfortable, they fit good, and I perform well in them. The colors really make you look flashy but the function is there too!
customer_reviews.author: Ladie Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love! A little hard to get my feet in but once on they are so comfortable. I find that they make my boxing workout more productive! You won’t be disappointed if you buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clark

customer_reviews.title: nice looking boxing shoe
customer_reviews.text: nice looking boxing shoe, but ineffective, in ankle support , this is the second item I purchased from ringside, of poor quality, the other was a 200 pound heavy bag. they make nice looking things, and then ruin them with poor construction of the final product.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a shoe that isn't too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's 6-6.5 and bought these in a men's 4. I was worried they would be too small, but they fit like a slipper. I haven't tried them in the ring yet, so hopefully they still feel good after some active wear. These also seem to have just a little bit of arch support. The blue color looks fantastic in person, I can't wait to show off at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great feel. Little foot space do to no half ...
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Little foot space do to no half sizes and it feels a little Heavy at times as well. But, they are a good buy all in all to get the job done and the style looks great in person
customer_reviews.author: Jay Forde

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great! They have nice grip and comfort compared to other training shoes. The back of the ankle part does fold down and feels a bit uncomfortable, but a couple pair of thick socks should help. Was disappointed the shoe strings were dirty when i opened the package. All in all great pair of shoes plus i rock them pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Joelli

customer_reviews.title: Wear them in my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I wear them in home gym when using my heavy bags. They work for me. No more slipping around on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Julieann

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for wide feet! Size 13.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4", 255 lbs. & I have the hardest time finding wide shoes for me. I was reluctant to buy these Diablos because I thought there was no way I'd find boxing shoes that fit for such a great price. I was so wrong! If you suffer from wide feet these are the ones. I didn't have to buy a size bigger or smaller. They run pretty true.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchfits

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend and reorder for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Never bought any kind of footwear online. So, was a little reluctant. Out of the box - on the foot Great fit. Didn’t need an insert. I normally wear a 10 1/2W. Since there are no half sizes I went to 11. Length is good width is good. All good, price is good, quality good. love them. I did re-lace them for laces to adjust easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews said they were similar in sizing to your shoe size, but they were bigger
customer_reviews.text: We had to return them, they were too big. We checked the reviews and most said the sizing was close to your shoe size. We measured my son's feet and ordered the size recommended, but they were too big for him to wear. We decided to get shoes from a retailer where he can try them on first. They seemed to be good quality, but he couldn't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent! Saved me from pain in my foot from plantar fasciitis and knee pain. Just wish I hadn’t waited so long to buy. Changed my boxing workout! Thank you Ringside!
customer_reviews.author: mjs71

customer_reviews.title: I cant wait to use these 🥊🤘🏼
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of boxing shoes. Nice and light. Good for wide feet aswell. Got the qualities you need for a good boxing shoe. Its mid top so its not low but not considered a high top neither. Cant wait to use these at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: information not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these boots for a diffent size. They are sold as men's boots, but the description says 'PINK IN WOMEN'S SIZE ONLY". So I ordered an 8 women's. The boots were an 8 men's, which were huge for my granddaughter. As a product they seem fine, she is satisfied with them. I just wish I had not had to go through the trouble of returning and reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Perfect for lifting, not much ankle support but there is some. I have a white and orange pair, and my boyfriend has red and black. They are true to color and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are fine. I do not like the huge price difference ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine. I do not like the huge price difference between sizes. Although, it looks like the price has since dropped since my purchase, but a good shoe overall. I ended up settling for a size larger and paid about half the price of the size I actually needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong insole size for shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I've worked out in these twice and something felt off about them. The insole on the left foot is for a size 7 despite the shoe size being an 8.. Unfortunately I have a sparring match this weekend and dont want to return them... I would not recommend these shoes, pay the extra money for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, and love the way the feel on my feet. Fit to size. Supports my ankle too.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Great color and fit
customer_reviews.text: The Ringside boxing shoe fits true to o size, the color and quality of the shoe is great
customer_reviews.author: Bridget M.

customer_reviews.title: Best boxing shoes I own!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally post product reviews, but these shoes are so comfortable and good-looking that I will. I actually purchased a second pair after my first ones arrived so I could use one for outdoor training and one for sparring at the gym. VERY highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a pro boxer so my needs were limited ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro boxer so my needs were limited. Just some light sparring a couple days a week. These cut the mustard and look dope as fuh.
customer_reviews.author: anthony gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️ Them; yet, order a size down because they run a bit big. I wear 5.5 and I order size 4 and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to wear tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying these without trying them on first. I usually kickbox barefoot, although some mats got moved so I needed shoes. I don't like to wear tennis shoes, so thought I would give these a try. I love them, they feel great. I wear a womens size 10. I bought the size 8 as they were only selling in mens sizes. They fit great! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the sole was not the best. After 45 minutes of intense boxing, I was getting blisters on the balls of my toes. No ankle support either. Make the shoes very tight to get some degree of ankle support. But, it is very lightweight and stylish. Forgot I had shoes on the first few minutes of class.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sam

customer_reviews.title: (╯(╰,)
customer_reviews.text: I am a 8.5 in men's I ordered a size 9 due to no half sizes but the comfort level in these is like 0 to none. Killing my ankles. Ordered a different pair from different company I don't have the patience to deal with returns so I will be giving these away. 1 star
customer_reviews.author: josiah l.

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty cheap poor quality material. Possibly because they wanted the shoe very light but I didn't like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja.Clint

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I looked at other reviews and the mentioned the wide fit. Great shoe to wear meets all the hype well done. I will buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Bob PT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second pair I've purchased. They are extremely light weight and fit perfectly. I generally wear a 10.5, but 10 was great for me. The arrived in a timely manner and came packaged very professionally and neatly. Would definitely recommend for anyone in the market for boxing shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Murpht

customer_reviews.title: A size too big.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks great & it has good quality. However I bought a 9 but it fits a size bigger so if you're a 9 like me order a 8. Order a size smaller. Other than that the shoe is great. Also it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are dope! I use them to lift weights in. They're perfect for squats & deadllifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: After some confusion with carrier services finally I got this wonderful boxing boots Great for beginning Boxin definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Order just "Half" an inch on top of your regular shoes size...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes already before even getting to the gym. Very comfortable and light.. I wear 9.5 and ordered a 10 and they fit perfectly... Great choice... That's my 3rd pair in 2 days and this was the one that fits great
customer_reviews.author: Eric Duvan

customer_reviews.title: Missing insert.
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes came without the inner sole insert. Very disappointed. Was excited to try them out. They felt nice up through the ankle. Very lightweight and snug. But will have to return and spend a little more money for a better quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Best boxing shoes Ive had.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like dancing on clouds. Amazing, just waiting for the orange ones to pop up. Then I'll buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: A&A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Improve your size chart
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t know if they are comfortable since your size chart is so confusing. I got it three sizes up, and sold them to my coach. You have to define it better. Now I ordered a new pair of adidas. Hopefully their size chart is more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Lior Merom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after just a few months of being un gym 2-3x a week. Too shiny and cheezy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, oversized
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I returned them, the size was HUGE, great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Used ? Yes. Lower PRice.  Stunk like skunk
customer_reviews.text: I get it that they were lower price because it was probably used once before. But don't sell them with the stink!!!
customer_reviews.author: The practical Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: My son and I bolth have a pair his are red mine are blue they look great and are light lace them tight if you want ankle support great for boxing
customer_reviews.author: Kc chiefs

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for kickboxing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my daughter in black - she loves loves loves them. The size 5 fit her perfectly and the shoes look great on her. I highly recommend these boxing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D Kap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these shoes. Bought true to my size 6 in woman and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Again I bought these for my niece who is a boxer in the Timothy league, she was amazed on how cute this were. She told me fitted perfectly and looks great on her. She is a 12 year old and her women size is a 9, she told me runs a little big but comfortable enough not to returned them for another size.
customer_reviews.author: Jhanny

customer_reviews.title: Not right about man sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them but didn't fit The reviews I read said they were man sizes, but when I ordered 2 numbers down the shoes didn't fit. So, buy them your usual number size.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for people with flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me boyfriend and he said they are very uncomfortable for him. He does have flat feet, but he tried inserts and it didn't help at all. Over all, he said they aren't very comfy. Be aware if you have flat feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jess R

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Very comfortable and roomy not like traditional boxing shoes that are very tight
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like boxer-type shoes; however, I had to return these b/c they were too big :(...
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the shoe is not constructed well. On one of the shoes the bottom is peeling off at the front of the shoe after purchasing one month ago and wearing it a total of 6-7 times. Would not recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Su

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother. He hasn't used them yet but the look very nice and light. I recommend buying one size smaller since they are big.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 women's and the size 7 fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: blueridgeishome

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but wish it came in 1/2 sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but wish it came in 1/2 sizes. I measure an 11 on the Brannock Device, but an 11 in this shoe was too large for me. I ended up going with a size 10 which is snug, but hoping it will stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Nic O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap  across the matt
customer_reviews.text: They looked cheap, they felt cheap, they fell apart like they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Russo

customer_reviews.title: perfect boxing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about two months. perfect boxing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bell

customer_reviews.title: 5 like me then
customer_reviews.text: They apparently don't do half sizes so if you wear 10.5 like me then, then they don't have shoes that fit you. Is there anything more important in a workout shoe than that it fits properly? No, there is not.
customer_reviews.author: school

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these. Takes a little bit to break them in but I’m very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I still love you still my favorite but I have to buy 2 Pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rossano Case

customer_reviews.title: Black fit fine but the pink too small
customer_reviews.text: Order size 5 in this color and black.Black fit fine but the pink too small. The EUR size was different on the pink from the black but the US size was the same (5)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for the price Highly recommended I use them five days a week When I train. You barely even know you’re wearing a shoe They have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Hamdy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived on time and were exactly what I was looking for. I initially wanted to buy elsewhere but they were sold out everywhere else. Glad I found them. Will buy from seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro

customer_reviews.title: Great Look!
customer_reviews.text: My son boxes and loves this brand. The shoes fit perfect and look good! He was completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Drosenkranz422

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: The patent leather is so soft. Very comfortable and well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Work great didn't have half sizes and I'm a 10
customer_reviews.text: Work great didn't have half sizes and I'm a 10.5 so mine were a little big, but not to the point they were detrimental to my performance. Comfortable shoe and good soles for footwork without the worry of slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin henry

customer_reviews.title: The shoes come a little big but great feel. Super light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes come a little big but great feel. Super light but sturdy. Have been wearing them for about 2 months now and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes run a little large but other than that they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Great boxing shoe for women!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I box 3X a week and it feels so different when I’m moving compared to running shoes I used to wear. I wear a 7-1/2 women’s shoe so I got the men’s 6 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vaz M.

customer_reviews.title: The laces are very annoying!
customer_reviews.text: They do not run 2 sizes smaller.......they are definitely true to size
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Calandrino

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I would like some boxing shoes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these regularly for about a year and a half now, they're holding up! Great shoes. I would like some boxing shoes with more arch support, though...
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do boxing 3-5 days a weeks. I’ve had the shoes for about a month now & so far so good. They feel & fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Back by Achilles seems kind of loose . other wise gooe so far. Let's see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boxing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for boxing. Great support and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Kind of uncomfortable but you can get used to them and the support should be better but for the price not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Guampo Myers

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BEGINNER SHOE
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing boxing shoes and this is a great start. Lightweight while providing support.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: This shoe are excellent. They are very comfortable, and I feel light on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: craig jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good pair, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them. He says that they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great and have been using them everyday training. So far have been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: shane platz

customer_reviews.title: Color comes off too easily
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a higher rating, but the color came off the toe area after only 3 or 4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really Great shoe. I use them for training in the gym, not boxing. They are specially good for leg days. Order 1 Size Smaller. Im a 9. Ordered 8 based on other reviews. Good quality , lightweight. They fit perfectly. Will buy white ones also.
customer_reviews.author: G. Guerrero

product_meta.title: Ringside Diablo Wrestling Boxing Shoes
product_meta.description: These contemporary styled shoes will have your opponent cursing like the devil. The Ringside Diablo Boxing Shoes usher in a new generation of high performance ring footwear. Breathable nylon mesh pattern. Patent leather vinyl finish. Low-top ankle for fluidity and ease of movement. Non-slip, rubber sole. Black, Blue, Red and White models are available in Men's Sizes 2 - 13. Note: Women's shoe sizes are 2 sizes smaller then men's. (Example ) If these are being purchased for a female that wears a size 8 then a size 6 in this shoe/color way is suggested for purchase. Note the Hot Pink Shoes are made in Women's Sizes.
feature_bullets: The Ringside Diablo Boxing Shoes are contemporary in style and usher in a new generation of high performance ring footwear
These sport-specific shoes have a patent leather vinyl finish and a low-top ankle for ease of movement and ankle support
Made with a breathable nylon mesh pattern and a non-slip rubber sole for added comfort and safety while fighting
Please see size chart with foot measurements to help determine sizing - (Women size 7 = Men size 5) Men's sizes: All colors except Pink - Women's sizes: Only in Pink
